document.full_text: the national hockey league was under attack from all sides on thursday as fans, sponsors and politicians expressed outrage at the rising levels of violence in the sport, following a devastating hit on montreal canadiens' forward max pacioretty.
document.title: outrage grows over escalating nhl violence
lines_and_colors: the national hockey league was under attack from all sides on thursday as fans, sponsors and politicians expressed outrage at the rising levels of violence in the sport, following a devastating hit on montreal canadiens' forward max pacioretty.
